resources.string:
You must provide your own OpenAI API key to connect to OpenAI\'s Realtime API with.

This app will locally encrypt and store your API key on this device only for use by this app only.

If you don\'t already have an OpenAI API key, create one at https://platform.openai.com/api-keys with 
\"Models = Read\"
and 
\"Model capabilities = Write\"
permissions.

Copy your OpenAI API key and then paste it into the 
OpenAI API Key
field below.
